casebody.data:
Carvell RICE, Petitioner
v.
S. DOWNS, Captain G. Gregavis, Hearing Examiner S. Luquis, J. Newberry, J. Weissinger, S. Anyanwu and Superintendent B. Tritt, Respondents No. 616 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
